document.title: Post example
document.description: This is a example of post created by Carlos Tarmeño

body.raw:
# Text Styles in Markdown

This is a regular paragraph of text.

# Header 1

## Header 2

### Header 3

## Text Styles

**Bold Text**  
_Italicized Text_  
~~Strikethrough Text~~  
**_Bold and Italicized Text_**

## Lists

### Ordered List

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Unordered List

- Item A
- Item B
  - Subitem B.1
  - Subitem B.2

## Links

[Link Text](https://www.example.com)

## Images

![Alt Text](/portfolio-logo.png)

## Blockquotes

> This is a blockquote.

## Code

`Inline Code`

```javascript
const formatDate = (date: string) => {
  const options: Intl.DateTimeFormatOptions = {
    year: 'numeric',
    month: 'long',
    day: 'numeric'
  };
  return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options);
};
```
